product_name: Mammut Brecon II GTX Boots - Men's
long_description: A half-height classic made from durable waxed suede leather, the waterproof Mammut Brecon II GTX Boots are built for hiking, light backpacking and occasional off-trail treks on rugged terrain. Boots are guaranteed to keep your feet dry with dependable GORE-TEX(R) waterproof, breathable membranes. Patented Mammut sole concept creates great support and damping; allows natural foot motion and limits ankle twisting. Stable thermoplastic polyurethane inserts in the arches provide excellent support and stability. Soft foam around the tongues and ankles add comfort. Mammut Brecon II GTX Boots have grippy, cushioning and perfectly rolling Vibram(R) MT Traction soles with flexible ribs and deep lugs for sure footing on rugged trails.
short_description: A half-height classic made from durable waxed suede leather, the waterproof Mammut Brecon II GTX Boots are built for hiking, light backpacking and occasional off-trail treks on rugged terrain.
